column1: Predicting and Analyzing Language Specificity in Social Media Posts
Yifan Gao@University of Texas at Austin
column2: Yang Zhong@University of Texas at Austin
column4: Junyi Jessy Li@University of Texas at Austin

column1: AAAI Technical Track: Natural Language Processing

column2: specificity quantifies how much detail is engaged in text. It is an important characteristic of speaker intention and language style
column3: and is useful in NLP applications such as summarization and argumentation mining. Yet to date
column4: expert-annotated data for sentence-level specificity are scarce and confined to the news genre. In addition
column5: systems that predict sentence specificity are classifiers trained to produce binary labels (general or specific).
